alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 1:10PM MST until January 08 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ TO 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Rio Grande Valley, Northern Lea, Central Lea, and Southern Lea. * WHEN...From 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ to 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
